Song.title: His Forever
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Pat Sczebel Â© 2003 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [||: D A | G G/B | D A | G :||]
Verse 1: [D]Jesus, friend of [G]sin[D]ners, [D]loved me ere I [A]knew [G]Him [D]Drew me with His [G]cords of [D]love, [Em7]tightly bound me [A]to [D]Him [D/F#]Round my heart still [G]closely [A]twined, the [D/F#]ties that none can [Bm]se[A]ver For [D]I am His and [Asus]He is [Bm] mine, for[Em7]ever and for[A]ev[D (to intro)]er
Verse 2: [D]Jesus, friend of [G]sin[D]ners, a [D]crown of thorns You [A]wore for [G]me [D]Bruised for my trans[G]gres[D]sions, [Em7]pierced for my in[A]iqui[D]ties The [D/F#]wrath of God that [G]I de[A]served, was [D/F#]poured out on the [Bm]inno[A]cent He [D]took my place, my [A]soul to [Bm] save, now [Em7]I am his for[A]ev[D | D |]er
{key:E} Verse 3: [E]Jesus, friend of [A/E]sin[E]ners, I [E]love to tell the [B/E]stor[A/E]y Re[E]deeming love has [A/E]been my [E]theme, and [F#m]will be when in [Bsus]glo[E]ry Not [E/G#]death nor life nor [A2]any[Bsus]thing, can [E/G#]ever sepa[C#m]rate [B]me O [E]love that will not [B]let me[C#m] go, yes [F#m7]I am His for[Bsus]ev[E]er Not [E/G#]death nor life nor [A2]any[Bsus]thing, can [E/G#]ever sepa[C#m]rate [B]me O [E]love that will not [B]let me[C#m] go, yes [F#m7]I am His for[Bsus]ev[E]er
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 jesus friend of sinners loved me ere i knew him drew me with his cords of love tightly bound me to him round my heart still closely twined the ties that none can sever for i am his and he is mine forever and forever verse 2 jesus friend of sinners a crown of thorns you wore for me bruised for my transgressions pierced for my iniquities the wrath of god that i deserved was poured out on the innocent he took my place my soul to save now i am his forever verse 3 jesus friend of sinners i love to tell the story redeeming love has been my theme and will be when in glory not death nor life nor anything can ever separate me o love that will not let me go yes i am his forever not death nor life nor anything can ever separate me o love that will not let me go yes i am his forever

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [||: D A | G G/B | D A | G :||]
Verse 1: [D]Jesus, friend of [G]sin[D]ners, [D]loved me ere I [A]knew [G]Him [D]Drew me with His [G]cords of [D]love, [Em7]tightly bound me [A]to [D]Him [D/F#]Round my heart still [G]closely [A]twined, the [D/F#]ties that none can [Bm]se[A]ver For [D]I am His and [Asus]He is [Bm] mine, for[Em7]ever and for[A]ev[D (to intro)]er
Verse 2: [D]Jesus, friend of [G]sin[D]ners, a [D]crown of thorns You [A]wore for [G]me [D]Bruised for my trans[G]gres[D]sions, [Em7]pierced for my in[A]iqui[D]ties The [D/F#]wrath of God that [G]I de[A]served, was [D/F#]poured out on the [Bm]inno[A]cent He [D]took my place, my [A]soul to [Bm] save, now [Em7]I am his for[A]ev[D | D |]er
{key:D} Verse 3: [D]Jesus, friend of [G/D]sin[D]ners, I [D]love to tell the [A/D]stor[G/D]y Re[D]deeming love has [G/D]been my [D]theme, and [Em]will be when in [Asus]glo[D]ry Not [D/F#]death nor life nor [G2]any[Asus]thing, can [D/F#]ever sepa[Bm]rate [A]me O [D]love that will not [A]let me[Bm] go, yes [Em7]I am His for[Asus]ev[D]er Not [D/F#]death nor life nor [G2]any[Asus]thing, can [D/F#]ever sepa[Bm]rate [A]me O [D]love that will not [A]let me[Bm] go, yes [Em7]I am His for[Asus]ev[D]er
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 jesus friend of sinners loved me ere i knew him drew me with his cords of love tightly bound me to him round my heart still closely twined the ties that none can sever for i am his and he is mine forever and forever verse 2 jesus friend of sinners a crown of thorns you wore for me bruised for my transgressions pierced for my iniquities the wrath of god that i deserved was poured out on the innocent he took my place my soul to save now i am his forever verse 3 jesus friend of sinners i love to tell the story redeeming love has been my theme and will be when in glory not death nor life nor anything can ever separate me o love that will not let me go yes i am his forever not death nor life nor anything can ever separate me o love that will not let me go yes i am his forever
